HomePage.title: The free, fun, and effective way to learn a language!
HomePage.aboutContent0: Learning with Lingo is fun, and
HomePage.aboutContent2: ! With quick, bite-sized lessons, you’ll earn points and unlock new levels while gaining real-world communication skills.
HomePage.aboutContent3: We make it easy to form a habit of language learning with game-like features, fun challenges, and reminders from our friendly mascot, Duo the owl.

exitModal.phase2: You're about to leave the lesson. Are you sure?
